job.title: VP-Site Reliability Engineer (SRE)
job.description: Job Id: 21332225<br><br>The deployment automation team at Citi manages a platform that orchestrates releases across a very large number of enterprise applications. This is a mature platform running without major issues and supporting modern deployment strategies like canary, blue-green, containers, microservices, public cloud alongside some more traditional distributed systems and databases.<br><br>As we expand our continuous delivery product portfolio, we are looking for a SRE, hands-on engineer with experience running platforms as scale leveraging industry observability and automation platforms. Someone who brings fresh ideas, demonstrates a unique and informed viewpoint, and enjoys collaborating with a cross-functional team to develop real-world solutions and positive user experiences at every interaction.<br><br>Responsibilities:<br><ul><li>Configure and tune the observability platforms we use to streamline alerting and proactive issue identification.</li><li>Automate manual activities as new features are added to the platform.</li><li>Ensure the platform functional test suite remains complete and runs quickly.</li><li>Expand performance and load testing capability to better simulate real production use.</li><li>Perform root cause analysis owning actionable follow-ups.</li><li>Measure and optimize system performance setting proper metrics and SLAs/SLOs</li><li>Mange risk and control activities across the platform and team<br></li></ul>Essential Skills:<br><ul><li>3+ SRE and operational role running a large enterprise platform</li><li>5+ years working with Linux</li><li>5+ years scripting in Python/Shell/Bash/Ksh.</li><li>3+ years of software development experience (Java on Linux)</li><li>Extensive experience working with and customizing automation scripts – Ansible is currently used.</li><li>Prior experiences with DevOps CI/CD tools like Git and Jenkins.</li><li>Experience analyzing data to drive decisions.</li><li>Competent with API, web services and microservices development</li><li>Strong communication skills, both written and oral</li><li>Strong architecture and design</li><li>Strong analytical, algorithmic, and problem-solving skills</li><li>Excellent teamwork and proactive attitude</li><li>BS/MS degree in Computer Science or related technical field<br></li></ul>Desired Skills:<br><ul><li>Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, Openshift</li><li>Experience with Sql/NoSql databases like Oracle, MongoDB</li><li>Java Spring Framework development experience</li><li>Experience in Config Management tooling e.g. Ansible, Chef, Puppet or SaltStack</li><li>Experience writing automation tests</li><li>Ability to quickly learn new concepts and
